title: Actor William Rush Passes Away at Age 31
summary: William Rush, an actor from the TV show Waterloo Road, has died at 31 years old. His family shared this sad news. He played a schoolboy named Josh Stevenson in the drama and was in many episodes. As a child, he also acted in other shows like Grange Hill and Shameless. His mother, Debbie Rush, who is also an actress, said their hearts are broken. She told people on Instagram about his passing. William was kind and became an organ donor, which means he helped other people by giving his organs after he died. This gave hope to other families. His family asks for privacy as they grieve. Other actors from shows like Coronation Street sent messages of support to his mother. They called him a beautiful boy and expressed their sadness.
